nodes.text: Jogan fruitcake was a type of cake from the planet Coruscant made from jogan fruit, as well as having raw jogan fruit as the garnish on top. During the Clone Wars, Republic Senator Padmé Amidala chose to serve a jogan fruitcake during a banquet she held in honor of Roonan Senator Aang, a member of the Galactic Senate's Military Oversight Committee, as the dessert was known to be Aang's favorite. It was also served at Old Jho's Pit Stop, a cantina on the planet Lothal run by the Ithorian Jho. The cake was one of the human Jedi Padawan Kanan Jarrus's top five favorite desserts served in the establishment.
At least on Coruscant, the dessert was not considered to be complete without the jogan fruit garnish.
